name: Ecchi Spirit
description:
Takeshi is a famous exorcist. He had heard about horrible forest spirits attacking people in a small village. But, upon arrival, he found out that those spirits are only interested in young maidens and they are not really trying to hurt anyone, they want something else...
Use your exorcism skills to find spirits and chase them away. It is not an easy task, those perverted spirits love to stick to a girl’s body, sometimes in the most precious places.

Ecchi Spirit is a point-and-click arcade game focused on erotic experience. The game is fully 3D and you can move the camera as you like. Play more to unlock new costumes for a girl or to strip her.

  • 3 girls, each with her own personality, her level of attractiveness to forest spirits.
  • The intriguing story in a form of a visual novel.
  • Combo system rewards you for quick actions.
